# PixelForge

> AI-powered retro pixel game character creator. Describe a character, get sprite sheets, play in a live sandbox.

## Pages
- [Home](https://pixelforge.harikp.com): Create pixel game characters with AI
- [Gallery](https://pixelforge.harikp.com/gallery): Browse community-created sprites
- [Sprite Detail](https://pixelforge.harikp.com/sprite/{id}): Individual sprite with animated previews and playable sandbox
